description:
Summary score based on the 8 items for the Rapid Estimate of Adult Literacy in Medicine (REALM-R). The total score is the number of positively endorsed responses (i.e., pronouced correctly) to 8 medical words. Those with a score of 6 or less should be considered to be at risk for poor health literacy. [Bass PF 3rd, Wilson JF, Griffith CH. 2003 (PubMed ID: 14687263)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/14687263/)

[Search for all realm variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=realm)
